featured.text: winning medals at the 2013 World Championships in Brazil, he decided to seek protection.

definition.zh_def: 冠軍賽，通常指體育或競賽中決定最優秀參賽者的比賽。
definition.en_def: Competitions held to determine the champion of a particular sport or event.
definition.example: The team celebrated their victories in multiple championships this season.
